welcome_message_title: Welcome to Capelle aan den IJssel
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Capelle aan den IJssel! This charming city is known for its picturesque canals, green spaces, and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Capelle aan den IJssel has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.
